Potential 1.title: Frontline Sweep
Potential 1.description: Battle skill The Pulverizing Front improved: When hitting at least 2 enemies, 15 SP is returned.

Potential 3.title: When the Banner Flutters
Potential 3.description: Talent The Living Banner improved: Amount of SP recovery needed to gain Fervent Morale is reduced to 60. Max Fervent Morale stacks on self +2.

Potential 4.title: Shield of Talos-II
Potential 4.description: Ultimate Shieldguard Banner, Forward improved: Ultimate Energy cost -15%.

Potential 5.title: Newly Forged Blade
Potential 5.description: Combo skill Full Moon Slash improved: Length of cooldown -2s; SP recovery is increased to 1.2 times the original.
